Race.SpecificTitle: PW Millage Rededication -- 1 Mill - PC - 20 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of St. John the Baptist, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), be authorized to rededicate the proceeds heretofore or hereafter received from the levy of a special tax of one (1) mill ("the Tax") on all property within the Parish subject to taxation (an estimated $405,226 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the Tax for an entire year) originally approved for juvenile detention center purposes to constructing, renovating or improving facilities for housing and detaining juvenile offenders and/or various personnel associated with juvenile justice services, including providing necessary furnishings, equipment and transportation therefor, and paying costs associated with juvenile justice programs including preventative programs in the Parish?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW School Board -- 1/4% S&U Tax - SB - Perp.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide School Board Proposition
(1/4% Sales Tax)
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish School Board of the Parish of St. John the Baptist, State of Louisiana (the "School Board"), under the provisions of Article VI, Section 29 of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana of 1974, and other constitutional and statutory authority, be authorized to levy and collect a tax of one-fourth of one percent (1/4%) (the "Tax"), in perpetuity, from and after July 1, 2017, upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption and storage for use or consumption of tangible personal property and on sales of services in the Parish (an estimated $2,400,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), all as defined by law, with the proceeds thereof (after paying the reasonable and necessary costs and expenses of collecting and administering the Tax), to be dedicated and used as follows: (i) 50% for the purpose of the payment of salaries and benefits for all permanent school employees; and (ii) 50% for the purpose of maintaining and repairing all school buildings?
